All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Card
Class representing a playing card.
Deck
Class representing a deck of cards.
Game
Represents a poker game with a list of players, a deck of cards, and game state.
GameState
Enum representing the different states of a game.
Hand
Class representing a player's hand in the game.
HandCompare
Class responsible for comparing poker hands and determining the winner.
HandRank
Represents a hand ranking in poker, consisting of the hand's type (e.g., STRAIGHT_FLUSH) and a list of kickers (additional cards used for comparison in case of ties).
HandType
Enum representing the different types of poker hands, ordered by their rank (highest to lowest).
MainClient
The MainClient class is responsible for establishing a client connection to a server, managing the communication channel, and handling I/O operations via non-blocking sockets.
MainServer
MainServer class to handle the communication between clients and the server using Java NIO.
Player
Represents a player in a poker game.
Rank
Enum representing the ranks of cards in a deck, from TWO to ACE.
Suit
Enum representing the suits of cards in a deck.
